 FAQ
 
 I cannot change my Wi-Fi settings while in Airplane Mode.
 A: The settings interface automatically "disables" wi-fi configuration in airplane mode. To alleviate this problem you can A) Connect to the wireless connection before going into Airplane mode. B) Install AnyCut and create a "Wi-Fi Settings" shortcut, that will let you change the configuration while in airplane mode.
 
 Can I uninstall this Application after changing the configuration?
 A: Yes you can. The application changes the system settings and does not run in the background in any way.
